lines: New to Idyllshire? Never fear! I know these parts like the back of my hand, and nothing would give me greater pleasure than to personally give you a guided tour!
So what do you say, friend? It'll be the best thousand gil you ever spent! I did mention it costs a thousand gil, yes? Believe me, it's worth that a hundred times over!
I'll take you anywhere you fancy for 1000 gil! Ah, I see you managed to find some work for yourself.
Honestly I thought my luck had turned when I got that job, but I'm going to need more work than that if I'm to put food on the table. However, do not despair, I won't be giving up any time soon!

obj.n: ミスライトディフェンダーピアス
ダルメルストライカージャケット
ダルメル・ストライカーアームガード
ラミーストライカートラウザー
ダルメルストライカーレギンス
